moves.1... d5 2. exd5 c6: Lasker variation, I play now Nf3.
moves.4... Nd4: menacing the queen and the fork attack by 5. ... Nc2
moves.5... Bf5: Carrying on attacking and freeing the c file
moves.7. Bb5+: mistake. white loose a bishop without changing really the situation
moves.7... Nxb5: White situation is very bad and black begins to think how to catch the queen
moves.8. Qb4: Blunder ! The queen has to left the square at once
moves.8... Nd4 9. Na3: The queen has very little places to go. White should have plaid 9. d3
moves.12... Bc6: The queen is dead and white submit.

gameName: scand. def. Lask. var. acc. 4. f3
